definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Students in higher grades should also learn to appreciate the works of ancient calligraphers.
sentences.chinese: 高年級學生還應學會欣賞古代書法家的作品。

sentences.english: The author was Wang Xizhi, a calligrapher in Jin Dynasty in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 作者王羲之，中國古代晉代書法家。

sentences.english: The calligraphers inherit and develop on the traditional ancient seal character .
sentences.chinese: 歷代大篆書法家對傳統的繼承和創新。

sentences.english: Mr Jiang Shilu army Wu origin, is the Honorary Chairman of the Chinese calligraphers ' Association.
sentences.chinese: 姜世祿先生軍武出身，是中國書法家協會名譽主席。

sentences.english: The famous calligraphist old Mr. Su Shi grants the black question in order that " the east grape in Beijing is agricultural " for him.
sentences.chinese: 著名書法家蘇適老先生爲他賜墨題爲“京東葡萄農”。

sentences.english: This calligrapher writes a forceful hand, with bold and vigorous strokes.
sentences.chinese: 這位書法家的書法蒼勁有力，入木三分。

sentences.english: The famous calligrapher gave away some of the spring couplets he wrote.
sentences.chinese: 這位知名書法家將他寫的一些春聯送給別人。

sentences.english: They have been highly praised by calligraphers and painters through the age.
sentences.chinese: 幾個世紀以來，得到書法家和畫家的高度讚譽。

sentences.english: He asked, strangely enough, this is why calligrapher .
sentences.chinese: 他奇怪地問書法家這是什麼原因。

sentences.english: Xianyu Shu is an outstanding calligrapher of the early Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 鮮于樞，元代初期著名的書法家。

sentences.english: In the calligrapher's pen, they are more vigorous and effective are different forms.
sentences.chinese: 在書法家的筆下，它們更是形態各異剛勁有力。

sentences.english: He is a well-known calligrapher in the area.
sentences.chinese: 他可是當地有名的書法家呀。

sentences.english: Wen Peng was a Ming Dynasty calligrapher4 and painter.
sentences.chinese: 文彭是明代的書法家兼畫家。

sentences.english: Portrait of Wang Xizhi, the great Jin calligrapher, famed for his semi-cursive writing.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲最擅長寫行書的晉代大書法家王羲之。

sentences.english: Study other calligraphers to learn the Insular half-uncial form.
sentences.chinese: 研究其他書法家學習島嶼半安色爾字體形式。

sentences.english: Li Duo, is a famous calligrapher who was born in Liling city, Hunan province in 1930.
sentences.chinese: 李鐸，著名書法家，一九三0年生，湖南醴陵人。

definition: abbr. for 中國文學藝術界聯合會|中国文学艺术界联合会, China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)
